nodes.text: Habeer Zignean was a human male from Ord Mirit, who participated in the Battle of Hoth under the callsign Green Five. He attended Princess Leia's pilot briefing before heading to his ship.

Habeer Zignean was first identified in "Rogues Gallery: Clearance for Immediate Launch" in Star Wars Insider 146. Zignean's helmet prop was originally worn by Tiree in A New Hope. The character who would become Habeer Zignean was portrayed by English actor John Mogridge, who also portrayed a number of other characters in the original trilogy.
